metadata.title: CVE-2023-52448 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: gfs2:Fix kernel NULL pointer dereference in gfs2_rgrp_dump Syzkaller hasreported a NULL pointer dereference when accessing rgd->rd_rgl ingfs2_rgrp_dump(). This can happen when creating rgd->rd_gl fails inread_rindex_entry(). Add a NULL pointer check in gfs2_rgrp_dump() toprevent that.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
